code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import allReducers from'./reducers/index';const middleware=[thunk];const userInfoFromStorage=localStorage.getItem('userInfo')?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userInfo')):null;let initialState={userLoginReducer:{userInfo:userInfoFromStorage}};const store=createStore(allReducers,initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(...middleware)));export default store;
